org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class EditLogBackupInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.EditLogInputStream
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.EditLogBackupInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

     class EditLogBackupInputStream
extends EditLogInputStream
    An implementation of the abstract class EditLogInputStream, which is used to updates HDFS meta-data state on a backup node.
    See Also:
    (org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.protocol.NamenodeRegistration, int, int, byte[])

      private static class  EditLogBackupInputStream.ByteBufferInputStream
      A ByteArrayInputStream, which lets modify the underlying byte array.
